name: mEAT (✧Wxxjxx✧)
description:
You play as 'Seven,' an object head girl who opened her eyes in a storage at a restaurant. With the help of a pie object head girl named ‘Meatpie’ and a mysterious cat named Cheshire, can you get out of here? (The English version is currently being translated, sorry.)

This game takes about an hour to finish. This game includes::

  • light chase scenes and a few puzzles
  • object heads (lots of them)
  • slight blood/gore elements

Please let me know if you stream or make a Let's play video of my game. I would love to see it! Thanks.
